## Endpoint.detachFromConnection() method

Detaches this Endpoint from the given Connection. If `deleteOnEmpty` is set to true and there are no Connections after this one is detached, the Endpoint is deleted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
detachFromConnection(connection: Connection, idx?: number, transientDetach?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connection | [Connection](./core.connection) | Connection from which to detach. |
|  idx | number | Optional, used internally to identify if this is the source (0) or target endpoint (1). Sometimes we already know this when we call this method. |
|  transientDetach | boolean | For internal use only. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
